author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1723 Modified to return from handleError() when it is known that the exception was handled insided takeAction() method. This would be the case if the ErrorHandler received Process Timeout on a delegate with error handling action=CONTINUE

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1723 Modified startTimer().run() method to add the MessageTimeout to the ErrorContext object before calling error handler.

author: gsim
msg: QPID-2323: add a Uuid type and allow it as the value of a Variant.

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1723 Modified handleAction() to fix handling of action=CONTINUE when there is a process timeout.
